markdownRemark.html: Situated near Almeria in the new El Toyo residential and leisure complex, just a few metres from the beach, and very near the Cabo de Gata National Park. This a magnificent golf course, very well maintained and comfortable to walk without the need of a buggy. The course is very flat and has many bunkers but is not very difficult. The rough is low which helps you not to loose too many balls. It has excellent views and the scorecard is very useful for navigation if you have never played the course before.

frontmatter.title: Alboran Golf
frontmatter.description: Alboran Golf -  Situated near Almeria in the new El Toyo residential and leisure complex, just a few metres from the beach, and very near the Cabo de Gata National Park. This a magnificent golf course, very well maintained and comfortable to walk without the need of a buggy. The course is very flat and has many bunkers but is not very difficult. The rough is low which helps you not to loose too many balls. It has excellent views and the scorecard is very useful for navigation if you have never played the course before.
frontmatter.address: El Toyo, Km 12 Ctra del Aeropuerto, Retamar, 04131 Almería, Spain
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 45.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 45.00 euros
